sentences.en: Are you trying to seduce me?
Clever advertising would seduce more people into smoking.
sentences.cn: 巧妙策划的广告会引诱更多的人吸烟。

sentences.en: Craig Bellamy - Tries to seduce snake. Fails. Kills snake with a putter.
sentences.cn: 贝拉米 ― 试图引诱蛇. 尝试失败后,用高尔夫球棒杀死了蛇.

sentences.en: He has designs on her, eg wants to seduce her.
sentences.cn: 他对她存心不良(如想诱奸她).

sentences.en: He used all kinds of sweet talk to seduce the girl.
sentences.cn: 他用花言巧语勾搭那个姑娘.

sentences.en: He's trying to seduce his secretary.
In Greek mythology, the god Zeus took the form of a swan to seduce Leda.
sentences.cn: 在希腊神话里，主神宙斯化作天鹅引诱了勒达。

sentences.en: It is better to convince by argument than seduce by example.
sentences.cn: 以理说服强于举例诱导。

sentences.en: She has set out to seduce Stephen.
sentences.cn: 她已经开始勾引斯蒂芬了。

sentences.en: She uses her physical attractiveness to seduce an assortment of males.
sentences.cn: 她利用自己极富魅力的肉体引诱各式各样的男性.

sentences.en: The head lecturer was sacked for seducing female students.
sentences.cn: 这个首席讲师因诱奸女学生而被解雇。

sentences.en: There, he attempted to seduce Leia.
sentences.cn: 在那里, 他企图引诱莱亚.

sentences.en: Therefore, we'll seduce him with wealth and treat him as a friend.
sentences.cn: 因此, 我们要用钱财收买他,把他当朋友看待.

sentences.en: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you.
sentences.cn: 26我将这些话写给你们,是指着那引诱你们的人说的.

sentences.en: They kept trying to seduce me the whole time. And I didn't want to be seduced.
sentences.cn: 他们老是想引诱我. 我可不愿意上他们的钩.

sentences.en: This is an update to the re - seduce macro.
sentences.cn: 这是根据二次媚惑修改的宏.

sentences.en: Wealth and prestige did not seduce him.
sentences.cn: 金钱和名望无法引诱他.

words.tran_cn: 诱惑者；骗子；玩弄女性的人

trans.tran_en: to persuade someone to have sex with you, especially in a way that is attractive and not too direct

trans.tran_cn: 勾引，引诱，诱奸（妇女），诱使…堕落，迷惑，使入迷
trans.tran_en: to persuade someone to have sex with you, especially in a way that is attractive and not too direct
